item.title: Remove Pl0x
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

[center]Game Update #6

This next update brings the Wilderness Resource Arena from Oldschool.
The area is packed with medium and high-levelled resources that are ready to harvested. There is an NPC inside that will exchange your skilling items into banknotes, and there are two Runite golems that are ready to be killed and mined for ores.
[/center]

[center]

fGpArhy.png762×499

cu4GjDq.png763×500

M9UfmkJ.png762×500

kPOLrY4.png761×500
[/center]

[center]
Game Update #7

Game Update 7 brings a lot of bug fixes and suggestion additions that many players have requested.
The next update will bring a lot more player-submitted suggestions to the server (and hopefully less bug fixes).

Suggestions implemented:
Added spacebar to continue through dialogue, number keys to select a dialogue option
Pest Control changes: boat timer lowered, point cost for items Penance items lowered, xp nerfed
Buffed the Lightweight perk
Swapping noted items on a bankbooth now opens an input dialogue
Added amulet of strength to melee gear store
​Added the green teleporter to the donator zone
​Buffed elite clues
Added a waterpump to the donator zone
Added Nieve to the donator zone
Elkoy will now take you through the gnome maze
You can now pay farmers to watch after your crops with noted items
Increased the barrows crypt dig range
You will now be told the point price of an item in the MTA shop when you click value instead of it just saying ‘you can’t afford this item’
Added the Dragon pickaxe to the drop table of the Chaos Elemental

​Bug fixes:
Fixed the string jewellery spell experience
Can no longer charter to port phasmatys without Priest in Peril completed
Fixed a broken wilderness lever (Deserted Keep)
Fixed salve amulet on skeleton hellhounds/Vet’ion
Fixed hard leather item crafting
Fixed the right click context menu constantly closing
Fixed waterfiend animations
Fixed Nieve’s stand animation
Fixed bloodveld GWD animations
Fixed death spawn animations
Fixed troll general animations
Fixed the Culinaromancer’s chest disappearing
Players will no longer get a gravestone on death in the Corporeal Beast’s lair (there is also a warning interface now)
Removed debug message text in Wolf Whistle cutscene
Fixed a skilling dialogue problem[/center]

[center]
Small Update #8
Server’s been out just over 2 weeks and already on update #8? This is one hella dedicated staff team.

Misc:
Added two new perks due to player requests
Released the revamped Gnome traveller. The traveller is an NPC in Draynor that buys low level supplies from players. This means you can sell things like Copper ores or Arrow shafts if you are a new player in order to make some starting money.

Godwars Dungeon:
Lowered the stats of the bosses and minions

In-game voting store:
Penance gear is now obtainable in the store (still obtainable also via Pest Control)
Lowered price to imbue rings
Replaced the extended antifire in the credit store with a super potion set
Added cow outfit to credit store (October only)
Removed rune spikeshield/berserker shield
Lowered price of the herb box down to one credit
Added the bonesack item – similiar to the bonecrusher. Instead, it automatically sends bones to the bank whilst equipped. The bonesack will have priority over the bonecrusher if you have both with you.
​Lowered price of bonecrusher to match the price of the bonesack

QOL updates:
The message upon finishing a Slayer task is now colored for easy visibility
Completing your first Slayer task rewards 25k coins (this goes for everyone’s first Slayer task after this update) (new players will also be notified that this is a thing when they first log in)
Cleaned up a few messages
Added blue dragon scales and flax to mystery boxes
New players will now have an xp rate of 30x for all combat skills that are under level 25. We had this on Arios and people seemed to like it as it jumpstarts the annoying parts of early combat training (constantly hitting 0’s and 1’s)
Repositioned the Lava Maze Shooting Star so you won’t get demolished by deadly red spiders[/center]

[center][/center]

[center][/center]

[center][/center]

[center]Construction Almost Ready For Release![/center]

[center]

frUevOi.png761×447

9Dbwo2j.png757×449

Ff18k60.png756×440

mK5LlgZ.png759×447
[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Pl0x
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

[center]Game Update #5

This small update brings a few critical bug fixes to the table:

Fixed egg incubating
Fixed req assist interface
Fixed bank search not closing upon walking away
Fixed a Dwarf Cannon issue
Fixed a Slayer issue (task/point count)
Fixed Saradomin KC in Godwars
Fixed the Fertile Soil spell
Fixed Captain Barnaby’s right click opt
Fixed the Draynor anvil – you should now be able to access it
Fixed being able to equip rune platebody without quest
Fixed one of the roots in the Stronghold Slayer Cave
Vet’ion will now drop rubies and diamonds at the same time
Fixed a few other smaller bugs that were reported
​Fixed compass rotation
[/center]

[center][/center]

[center]Forums are brand new and unique, never seen before. they are custom made forums made by Hope:

Here you can see which friends on your friends list are online and offline:

rl4UGs0.gif300×510
[/center]

[center]All Current Players Online shown on the homepage on forums:
[/center]

[center]Player Flavius just recieved a blue mask during the Kratos Halloween event:

Here are his stats, he plays regularly a few or more hours everyday for well over a week:

wMuJgft.png770×508
[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Pl0x
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:16, topic:553460”]the client doesn’t work for me

Untitled_zps7wr8boud.png712×155
[/quote]

Your internet was slow At the moment. the timeout for connecting to the server is 3 seconds.

On other the other hand!

[center]Game Update #4

Update #4 brings two big features: the Stronghold Slayer Cave and player-to-player perk gifting.
The Cave is fully outfitted with all the Oldschool features like the Smoke Devil room, the Agility shortcuts, and the new Slayer master, Nieve.

The Cave introduces these new NPCs:
Smoke Devil
Thermonuclear Smoke Devil
Cave Kraken
Kraken boss/Enormous tentacles

And these items:
Abyssal tentacle whip
Kraken tentacle
Trident of the Seas
Smoke Battlestaff
Occult Necklace
Pet Smoke Devil

Perk Gifting has also been added to the store. (Kratos - The #1 2009 HD/OSRS Private Server)
This means you can effectively sell perks to one another easily without the hassle.

In addition to the above two updates, a few bugs were fixed:
Fixed shooting stars bug (star would delete when time ran out, even if people were mining)
Fixed Gnome Agility course completion state/xp.
Fixed Wilderness Agility course stepping stones & completion exp.[/center]

[center]

[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Pl0x
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

Game Update #2:

A few people made it clear to us that the server needs to be a tad bit easier, so without further ado:

  • Re-vamped the home-teleporter – now more organized & has more locations
  • New bank/home area style.
  • A mysterious portal has appeared at home! Stay tuned!
  • New shops added at home to better serve new players.
  • Prayer altar added at home.
  • Desert bandits were added.
  • Added OS herb boxes as a voting reward.
  • Items in the voting store were made easier to obtain.
  • Reported bug fixes.
  • Added middle mouse button camera movement


Read full topic

item.title: Remove Pl0x
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

Welliton_inc:

HD graphics ruins the purpose of OS. You should never associate OS RuneScape with higher revision graphics. This is basically just a pre-EoC server. Younger players who didn’t play RuneScape back in the day obviously don’t understand the importance of the graphics being SD.

Lol you’re going to compare 530 graphics to pre-Eoc? common now. and it’s not an oldschool Remade server… its a 2009 remake with some twists and turns also with oldschool items/bosses added to give the game a new/cooler feel. I’m 20 years old i started runescape when i was 6 years old in 2002. i remember every time graphics were updated… Yes Oldschool 498 graphics are better for “oldschool” but to have new “oldschool” items in HD is New to players who cannot get that simply playing runescape. but your opinion is your opinion and my opinion is my own.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Pl0x
item.dc:creator: @i_dd_s_k0_i i dd s k0 i
item.description:
@i_dd_s_k0_i wrote:

Welliton_inc:

HD graphics ruins the purpose of OS. You should never associate OS RuneScape with higher revision graphics. This is basically just a pre-EoC server. Younger players who didn’t play RuneScape back in the day obviously don’t understand the importance of the graphics being SD.

Lol.
No it’s not, the content goes way back than pre-eoc. The graphics is there to bring a new light to the oldschool-remake genre, let’s just put it that way. And I am enjoying the hell out of it, if you asked me. I am sure people who are looking for one will have a blast here.

Read full topic
